Class Summary
AbstractPlugin  
AsyncUploadPlugin The upload plugin allows the user to upload any file into a specified directory.

NodeAliasPlugin  
PluginHelper Static plugin helper class, provides basic access to plugins, like initializing and two types of collections to access available plugins.
SamplePlugin  
ScriptPlugin The ScriptPlugin takes a JavaScript as an argument executes it and renders the output of the script to the browser.

UserSearchPlugin This is the user profile plugin.
XGalleryPlugin The XGalleryPlugin is used to display a customizable gallery inside a page.
